title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – the purr-fect combination of comfort and fun for your furry friend!

This delightful cat tree is designed with the needs of your cat in mind. The soft, skin-friendly plush surface and the cozy carpet base offer a luxurious feel that your pet will love. The 2-in-1 design not only provides a comfortable condo for your kitty to rest but also includes a sisal scratching post to keep their claws healthy.

Safety is paramount, and this cat tree comes with a stable base to prevent any tipping or wobbling, ensuring peace of mind for you and a safe environment for your cat. Plus, it's designed to fit beautifully in your home, with a leafy green design that adds a touch of nature-inspired décor.

Setting up this cat tree is a breeze! It's easy to assemble in just a few minutes – no special tools needed, as everything is included right in the box. And with three lovely colors to choose from – Grey, Beige, and Green – you can pick the perfect match for your home.

The TSCOMON Cat Tree is lightweight at just 6 pounds, making it easy to move around, and it's designed to be placed on a flat floor against the wall for extra stability. Remember to check the size before purchasing to ensure it's the right fit for your space and your cat.

Our customer service team is dedicated to providing quality products and attentive service, with your satisfaction as our greatest pursuit. Should you need any assistance, our contact information is readily available.

Please note: While this cat tree is a wonderful addition to any cat's life, it's important to keep children from playing with it for their safety and the cat tree's longevity.

Give your cat their own special space with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – because your beloved pet deserves the very best!

Are you looking for a cozy and entertaining spot for your beloved feline friend? Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – the perfect blend of comfort and fun for your kitty, while being a lovely addition to your home décor!

**Comfort Meets Fun in Your Home!**

This charming cat tree is a 2-in-1 haven, designed with your cat’s needs in mind. With its plush 600g skin-friendly surface and a base covered in soft carpet, your furry companion will enjoy the utmost comfort.

**Sturdy and Safe**

Safety is paramount, and that's why this cat tree features a sturdy base designed to prevent any tipping or wobbling. We recommend placing it on a flat floor against the wall for maximum stability.

**A Touch of Greenery**

The unique leaves design not only provides an aesthetic touch resembling family greenery but also adds a sense of nature to your living space.

**Playful and Relaxing**

Equipped with a hang ball for endless fun and a sisal material scratching post to satisfy your cat’s natural scratching instincts, this cat tree is the ultimate playground. The condo size is perfect for kittens or one medium-sized cat to rest and play.

**Simple and Quick Assembly**

Worried about complicated setups? Fear not! Our cat tree is designed for easy assembly. You can put it together in just 1 to 8 minutes with the included tools and straightforward instructions.

**Choose Your Cat's Style**

With color options of Grey, Beige, and Green, you can select the perfect shade to complement your home.

**Lightweight and Portable**

Weighing just 6 pounds, this cat tree can be easily moved around your home for the ideal placement.

**Customer Service Excellence**

At TSCOMON, we are committed to providing quality products and attentive service. Your satisfaction is our pursuit, and we’re always here to help.

**Please Note**

Before making your purchase, kindly ensure to check the size to see if it fits your space. And remember, this cat tree is designed for your cat's enjoyment, so it's best to keep it a no-play zone for children.

Brighten your kitty's day and spruce up your home with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – the cozy and playful retreat your cat deserves!

Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – a cozy and delightful haven for your beloved feline friend! Designed with simplicity and comfort in mind, this cat tree is the perfect addition to your home, especially if you’re looking to spoil your kitty without causing any hassle or confusion.

**Features:**
- **Comforting Materials**: Crafted with a gentle 600g plush material that's kind to your cat's skin and a soft carpet at the base, your cat will enjoy the luxurious feel during their lounging and playtime.
- **Stable and Safe**: We've taken extra care to ensure stability with a well-designed base that prevents any tipping or wobbling, so you can rest easy knowing your pet is secure. Just place it on a flat floor against a wall for optimal safety.
- **Easy Assembly**: No need to worry about complicated instructions. This cat tree can be assembled effortlessly in just a few minutes (1 to 8, to be exact), and we've included all the necessary tools.
- **Fun and Functional**: Your cat will be entertained with the built-in hang ball and will love the sisal material scratching post that caters to their natural scratching instincts.
- **Soothing Aesthetics**: The lovely leaves design adds a touch of greenery to your home, making this cat tree not only a pet accessory but also a charming addition to your room's decor.

**Dimensions and Options:**
- This elegant cat tree measures 11 inches in length, 15 inches in width, and stands 41 inches tall. 
- It weighs just 6 pounds, making it easy to move if needed.
- Choose from three soothing colors to match your home's style: Grey, Beige, or Green.

**Customer Service Commitment:**
Our dedication to your satisfaction is unwavering. If you have any questions or need assistance, our customer service information is always available.

Each package includes 1 Cat Tree, 1 Assembly Instruction, and 1 Set of Tools. Before purchasing, please ensure the size is suitable for your space and remember that this beautiful piece is for your cats' enjoyment and should not be used as a toy for children.

Your pet’s comfort and fun are just a few steps away with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – where elegance and enjoyment meet effortlessly.

Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – a delightful and cozy retreat for your feline friends with a touch of home greenery! Designed with the needs and comfort of your cat in mind, this 2-in-1 cat condo and scratching post is perfect for providing your beloved pet with a personal space to rest and play.

Crafted with a plush, skin-friendly surface and a soft carpet base, this cat tree is gentle on your cat's paws, ensuring they feel warm and pampered. The sturdy base is engineered to prevent tipping and wobbling, so you can rest assured that your cat will be safe while exploring their new haven.

The beautiful leaves design not only adds a charming touch to your home decor but also serves as a stylish piece of family greenery. Assembly is a breeze – you can easily put it together in just a few minutes with the included set of tools, and simple instructions ensure a hassle-free experience. With dimensions of 11" x 15" x 41", it's compact yet spacious enough for kittens or a medium-sized cat to enjoy.

Choose from three elegant colors: Grey, Beige, or Green, to match your home aesthetics. At a lightweight 6 pounds, the cat tree can be conveniently placed on a flat floor against the wall for added stability.

TSCOMON is committed to providing quality products and attentive service. Your satisfaction is our greatest pursuit, and our customer service contact information is readily available for any assistance you may need.

Please remember to check the size before purchasing to ensure it's the perfect fit for your space. While this cat tree is designed for your cat's enjoyment, it's important to keep children from playing with it for safety.
